(This letter has been scratched out and rewritten multiple times; clearly, the writer felt very conflicted.)

, how’s everything since you killed my dearest Argog? Hard feelings aside, I need to talk to you. I can get you Odwin and Leander.

I don’t trust you entirely, but you are the only one who can help me.

I don’t want to ask you a favor, but I cannot let them give the Red Raiders a bad name.
Meet me at {@linkcreature:55#7821#Rendezvous Point}.

— Hennika

[You must have equipment level 463 or higher to enter Grotto of Lost Souls.]

During the search for Leander, sided with a former foe, Hennika, who asked to capture Leander and Odwin.

When found Leander, the high elf was summonning a demon. destroyed the portal generator and stops the ritual. Frustrated by the failure of his plan, Odwin reverts to his true form: that ofthe dragon, Kylos!
After a brutal battle, returned to Hennika. who offerend a pendant normally only given to high-ranking Red Raiders.
delivered the pendant to Launa and told her that Leander's plan failed.

So, you're here.

I really didn't want to ask you for help.
Poor Argog, so cruelly butchered...

But I'm no fool. I cannot handle Odwin and Leander by myself. It's all I can do to stay one step ahead of the federation.

If anyone can stop them, it's you."I am listening."

Leander went completely nuts after this Odwin fellow started working with him.
I felt betrayed, because he no longer acts like a true Red Raider.

You understand?
Argog lived for the Red Raiders. And he died for the Red Raiders.

I cannot let Odwin and Leander defile Argog's good name and reputation... or the Red Raiders'.
I'm not the only one of us who feels this way.

You must help me defeat them."I will."

Thanks.
I know you have no reason to trust me, but you should do this.

Many of my comrades fell for Leander's promises... his lies.
I have to stop the rest of them from making the same mistake.

, go to the {@LinkCreature:55#9782#Grotto of Lost Souls} and deal with Odwin and Leander.

Odwin is dead? What of Leander?

What happened to him?"He slipped away."

Fair enough.
I hope to see him come around, but I know that's not likely to happen.

Nevertheless, you've given the raiders a second chance.
I was right to trust you."The feeling is mutual."

Don't think this erases what you did to Argog.
But you should take this.

Leander gave these pendants to the most high-ranking Red Raiders.
Take it to the federation. They'll think of it as another token of your heroism.

I still can't forgive you, but I will never forget that you helped me.

? Why are you here?
Did you know that the Red Raiders hide here?
Marvelous work! You were few steps ahead of me!

I took the tome to the federation. Translating it was a hassle, but it convinced them.
Leander is now the official leader of the Red Raiders."Do you recognize this pendant?"

I do.

Only worn by officers of the Red Raiders.

Did you get this from Leander?Explain what happened in the Grotto of Lost Souls.

It does not make sense. Why did Odwin not hold the ritual himself? He is far more powerful than Leander.

Is it because Leander is an expert on demonology?
I have a bad feeling about this. I will investigate this matter.

Anyway, we killed Leander's puppet master.
Leander should lay low for awhile.
Thanks for acting so quickly.
